title: Director PSX commends govt’s economic initiatives
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 2 (APP): Director of Pakistan Stock Exchange (PSX) Ahmed Chinoy said on Thursday that the steps taken by the present government to improve economic performance were crucial for achieving positive outcomes.
In an interview with Pakistan Television News, he said that the country’s economy was on the right track, with further improvement of the policies likely to yield desired goals soon. While the deep crises of the past were behind us, there was still much work to be done and a long way to go, he added.
He said that the present government was steering the economy in the right direction towards success.
Chinoy also highlighted the importance of maintaining industrial operations to send a positive message to the international community. He stressed that economic activity was pivotal for generating employment opportunities and fostering prosperity in the country.
Addressing the need to provide electricity at low rates for industries, he called for consensus among stakeholders to facilitate its implementation. He said that such measures would make Pakistan an attractive destination for industrial investment.
